name: LeonardRavenhillQuotes
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ravenhill's quotes
des:
This skills readout out famous quotes by Leonard Ravenhill. 

Leonard Ravenhill (1907 – 1994) was an English Christian evangelist and author who focused on the subjects of prayer and revival. He is best known for challenging western evangelicalism (through his books and sermons) to compare itself to the early Christian Church as chronicled in the Book of Acts. His evangelistic meetings during the Second World War drew large crowds. Many converts devoted themselves to Christian ministry and foreign missions. He was a proponent of the moral government or Governmental theory of atonement.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
